item.title: I feel like a kid in a candy shop … #reformatted-my-mac-day
item.description: I woke up this morning .. it’s pouring with rain … my Apple MacBook Pro decides it doesn’t want to connect to my wifi. So I had to do, what I had to do! and reformatted my Mac. Now … I’m getting up in running again. First things first .. Update my user preferences and move my home folder to the second partition (done) Download and Install Chrome (done) Download and Install Dropbox - point to my Dropbox folder on the other partition Download and install 1Password (done)
